name: Liminal Dreams (JacketAU)
description:
Hey everyone, I've been working on this project for quite a while and I thought now might be the right time to release a small demo to get all of your input!

I intend to release LD on Steam and have already made much more than is currently playable in the demo I can assure you!

Let me know what you think!

W/A/S/D 
Hold right click to ready your gun, left click to fire
E to interact with objects!
